parameters.name: Dia
parameters.description: Hole diameter

parameters.name: Sd
parameters.description: True for single-ended, false for double-ended

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True to flip the direction to cut, false to not

parameters.name: Dir
parameters.description: True to flip direction to extrude, false to not

parameters.name: T1
parameters.description: Termination type for first end as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: T2
parameters.description: Termination type for second end as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: D1
parameters.description: Depth of extrusion for first end in meters

parameters.name: D2
parameters.description: Depth of extrusion for second end in meters

parameters.name: Dchk1
parameters.description: True allows draft angle in first direction, false does not allow drafting

parameters.name: Dchk2
parameters.description: True allows draft angle in second direction, false does not allow drafting

parameters.name: Ddir1
parameters.description: For first draft angle to be inward use true, for draft angle outward use false

parameters.name: Ddir2
parameters.description: For second draft angle to be inward use true, for draft angle outward use false

parameters.name: Dang1
parameters.description: Draft angle for first end

parameters.name: Dang2
parameters.description: Draft angle for second end

parameters.name: OffsetReverse1
parameters.description: If you chose to offset the first end condition from another face or plane, then true specifies offset in direction away from the sketch, false specifies offset from the face or plane in a direction toward the sketch

parameters.name: OffsetReverse2
parameters.description: If you chose to offset the second end condition from another face or plane, then true specifies offset in direction away from the sketch, false specifies offset from the face or plane in a direction toward the sketch

parameters.name: TranslateSurface1
parameters.description: True to use an offset relative to the surface or the plane selected, false to use a true offset

parameters.name: TranslateSurface2
parameters.description: True to use an offset relative to the surface or the plane selected, false to use a true offset

parameters.name: UseFeatScope
parameters.description: True if the feature only affects selected bodies, false if the feature affects all bodies

parameters.name: UseAutoSelect
parameters.description: True to automatically select all bodies and have the feature affect those bodies, false to select the bodies the feature affects
